languages.text: Славный воитель Ульфар, шедший в бой со стаей Грозовых укусов и снискавший великое почтение среди воинов в первые же часы штурма, самолично пробрался в стан врага и вернулся с головами трех высокопоставленных еретиков, показав, что для Ангелов Императора сей план вполне посилен.

The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.
languages.original_text: Славный воитель Ульфар, шедший в бой со стаей Грозовых укусов и снискавший великое почтение среди воинов в первые же часы штурма, самолично пробрался в стан врага и вернулся с головами трех высокопоставленных еретиков, показав, что для Ангелов Императора сей план вполне посилен.

traits.locale_text: The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was quite within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was quite within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was quite within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

languages.text: 光荣的战士乌尔法与噬风者狼群一同出征。仅仅几个小时之后，他就赢得了所有同伴最崇高的敬意——他孤身一人闯入敌方要塞，之后带着三名高阶异端分子的头颅回到了营中。他的功绩证明，帝皇的天使们完全有能力实施这个计划。
languages.original_text: The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

traits.locale_text: 光荣的战士乌尔法与噬风者狼群一同出征。仅仅几个小时之后，他就赢得了所有同伴最崇高的敬意——他孤身一人闯入敌方要塞，之后带着三名高阶异端分子的头颅回到了营中。他的功绩证明，帝皇的天使们完全有能力实施这个计划。

languages.text: Le glorieux guerrier Ulfar, qui était parti au combat avec la meute des Crocs de la tempête et avait gagné le respect de ses camarades dès les premières heures de l'assaut, a pénétré dans la forteresse ennemie en solitaire. Il en est ressorti avec les têtes de trois hérétiques haut placés, prouvant que ce plan était largement à la portée des anges de l'Empereur.
languages.original_text: The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

traits.locale_text: Le glorieux guerrier Ulfar, qui était parti au combat avec la meute des Crocs de la tempête et avait gagné le respect de ses camarades dès les premières heures de l'assaut, a pénétré dans la forteresse ennemie en solitaire. Il en est ressorti avec les têtes de trois hérétiques haut placés, prouvant que ce plan était largement à la portée des anges de l'Empereur.

languages.text: 嵐食いの者たちの群れとともに出陣し、襲撃の最初の数時間で仲間たちから最大の尊敬を集めた栄光の戦士ウルファーは、単身で敵の要塞に侵入し、高位の異端者3人の首を持って帰還した。本作戦は皇帝の天使の能力の範囲内であることを証明した。
languages.original_text: The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

traits.locale_text: 嵐食いの者たちの群れとともに出陣し、襲撃の最初の数時間で仲間たちから最大の尊敬を集めた栄光の戦士ウルファーは、単身で敵の要塞に侵入し、高位の異端者3人の首を持って帰還した。本作戦は皇帝の天使の能力の範囲内であることを証明した。

languages.text: El glorioso guerrero Ulfar, que marchó al combate con la jauría de los Muerdetormentas y se ganó el respeto de sus hermanos en las primeras horas del asalto, entró en solitario en la fortaleza enemiga y volvió con las cabezas de tres herejes de alto rango, dejando claro que los ángeles del Emperador estaban a la altura de su cometido.
languages.original_text: The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

traits.locale_text: El glorioso guerrero Ulfar, que marchó al combate con la jauría de los Muerdetormentas y se ganó el respeto de sus hermanos en las primeras horas del asalto, entró en solitario en la fortaleza enemiga y volvió con las cabezas de tres herejes de alto rango, dejando claro que los ángeles del Emperador estaban a la altura de su cometido.

languages.text: Der glorreiche Krieger Ulfar, der mit dem Stormbiters-Rudel in den Kampf marschiert war und sich in den ersten Stunden des Angriffs den größten Respekt seiner Kameraden verdient hatte, ging allein in die Festung und kehrte mit den Köpfen dreier hochrangiger Ketzer zurück. Der Beweis, dass die Engel des Imperators durchaus in der Lage waren, diesen Plan umzusetzen.
languages.original_text: The glorious warrior Ulfar, who had marched into battle with the Stormbiters pack and earned his fellow fighters' greatest respect in the very first hours of the assault, entered the enemy fortress by himself and returned with the heads of three high-ranking heretics, proving that this plan was well within the ability of the Emperor's Angels.

Der Beweis, dass die Engel des Imperators durchaus in der Lage waren, diesen Plan umzusetzen.
